_header: Steel is good I say no other
_description: Women compared to steel — five quatrains and burden: ‘War yt war yt war yt wele / Wemen be as trew as stele’

CamStJohn259.First Lines:
Stel is gud I sey no oderSo mowun wemen be kaymys
                    broder…
CamStJohn259.Last Lines:
…& ryt for ny ned to play þe sayturwemen
                    be as trew as stele
CamStJohn259.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes,  and  G. C. Macaulay, eds.  
             “Fifteenth Century Carols and Other Pieces.” 
             Modern Language Review
         8 (1913): 68-87: 80.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 266-67; 1977, 236.
